name: Darkroot
description:
Escape an ever growing evil root entity that will never stop chasing you.

Instructions I hope are clear from the game's start screen, but listing here as well. Note this is the type of game where you will die a lot to start with, and this is part of the loop as you figure out the best way to navigate. 

WASD to Move 

Click to Build Turrets 

Energy powers your movement and ability to build turrets.

If you run out of energy, the root will get you. 

The root also sometimes chooses to go after the energy collectibles, and if it collects them it will get stronger and faster! 

Strategize to survive while powering up 5 conduit towers, and then escaping through the central portal. The game is quite hard, and I hope to perhaps do another pass at some point to add difficulty settings.
